name: Collect Coins - Version 2
description:
Move the 0 and collect the C with the arrow keys on your calculator

keep collecting the C until you have a score of 10.

The C will spawn in a random place every time you touch it.

You have 170 steps.  Every time you take a step, the step counter will show 1  less step then before you took the step.

If you run out of steps you lose.  If you collect 10 C's you win.

Press mode to quit the game.
